content: introducing the stargazer coaster the matching coaster to the ** stargazer pot holder 1 ** this pattern uses the double_crochet and front-post double_crochet stitch to create a beautiful sunburst design that is thick and absorbent the free pattern includes step-by-step pictures as well as a complete video tutorial i hope you have fun making your coasters > you can find the free written pattern here 2 > you can find the video tutorial here 3 > the ad-free printable pdf ebook 4 includes 2 patterns in 1 the stargazer coaster and pot holder materials * approximately 57 yds / 51 m of any worsted weight cotton yarn * 4 0mm crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle other info * 6 5 in diameter * works up in about 30 minutes * great way to use up scrap yarn * pattern has been tech edited * the ad-free printable pdf includes step-by-step pictures links to video tutorials and instructions to make both the stargazer coaster and pot holder 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/stargazer-pot-holder 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-stargazer-coaster/ 3 https //youtu be/6tcotgcwkzm 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/stargazer-coaster--pot-holder-ebook
